alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 09 at 11:07AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow for elevations above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 25 inches possible. Washington Pass will see more than 18 inches. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Washington Pass. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop due to falling and blowing snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Persons should delay all travel or take an alternate route if possible. Leave plenty of room between you and the motorist ahead of you. Make sure your car is winterized and you have a winter storm kit along with you.

area.areaDesc: Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
